title: CUTE 2 bedroom 2 bath apartment!
posting_body: ['To schedule a tour', 'We now book our tour appointments online!', 'Please call or text us at', 'show contact info', 'to self-schedule from your phone!', 'Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!', 'Property Description', 'Live the life you’ve always imagined – discover lavish and comfortable living at Fusion 355.', 'Offering a wide selection of studio, one, two, and three-bedroom layouts, our apartments in Broomfield, CO combine convenience and luxury designed with your comfort in mind.', 'With a range of sophisticated amenities and a top-notch location in the heart of Interlocken, your next home promises a living experience you don’t want to miss out on.', 'Picture coming home to the place where worries are long gone, thanks to the 24-hour maintenance service and the exceptional amenity package.', 'For your comfort and convenience, our controlled access community features elevators and bike storage, with reserved parking garage also available for select homes.', 'Our apartments are guaranteed to exceed expectations; outfitted with central air conditioning, designer cabinetry, Whirlpool stainless-steel appliance package, and much more.', 'Unrivaled stylish finishes like soaring 9-foot ceilings, hardwood-style flooring, together with oversized windows and spacious patios are only a glimpse at what sets Fusion 355 apart.', 'Our pet-friendly premises are a haven for your furry friend, boasting a one-of-a-kind dog park and pet spa.', 'And of course, with your well-being at the top of our list, we made sure you have numerous options to unwind or have fun.', 'Enjoy a refreshing swim in the resort-style pool, bond with friends at the media and game rooms, or socialize at the cyber café – with so much to offer at Fusion 355, you’ll never feel the need to leave!', 'Another perk you’ll love is our address itself, which connects you to top-of-the-line employers, including CU Boulder and IBM.', 'Spend your afternoon at Chautauqua Park, get some shopping done at FlatIron Crossing Mall, and grab a bite on your way home at one of the nearby eateries.', 'Wherever you’ll go, one thing’s certain: there’s no place like home.', 'Call us today to embrace the full experience at our apartments in Broomfield, CO!', 'Details', 'Availability date:', 'August 15, 2022', 'Pets:', 'Cats, Small Dogs (< 25lb), Large Dogs (> 25lb)', 'Pet notes:', 'We will allow a max of 2 pets per apartment home.', 'Breed Restrictions Apply.', ' Please call the office for pricing and details.', 'Deposit:', '$200 Holding Deposit', 'Leasing options:', '3 months,6 months,9 months,9+ months,12 months,12+ months', 'Leasing notes:', 'Application fee:', '$11.25 Per person over 18 years of age', 'Amenities', 'Included in Utilities Cost:',
